sources.title: The Loves of Joanna Godden
sources.description: Googie Withers stars as a young woman who flouts convention by choosing to run the farm she inherited, and by rejecting the man she is expected to marry.

metadata.Plot: The story of a woman who loved three men for their different ways and discovered after many a heartache, that her first love was also her true love. Edward the Peacemaker was on the throne of England when Joanna Godden's father died and bequeathed a large farm on the Romney Marsh of Kent. Beautiful, impetuous, self-willed, Joanna determined to defy convention and - a mere woman - run the farm herself. Her decision outraged the whole shire - not least her farmer neighbour Arthur Alce.
metadata.Writer: Sheila Kaye Smith, H.E. Bates, Angus MacPhail
metadata.Actors: Googie Withers, Jean Kent, John McCallum
